author: Osborne,Bruce
subject: Lupin III Petition is Now Up!!
body:
The Lupin III Petition is now up!!! You can all go and sign it :D

http://www.thesoyokaze.net/lupinpetition/petition.html

Thanks, also if any of you have a Lupin site don't forget ot put it up on
the links section, lets get this baby signed up!!!
--------------------------------------
Bruce Osborne
ICQ: 3 1 3 7 9 2 3 7
